item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Areal View of our NEW PADDLING "TRAINING"  COMPLEX of Long Slolem Canals of incomming foaming and rushing waters to practice your turning abilities around sharp corners, BIG Olympic sized pools with conditions just like a rough lake, Deep bubbling  Circular Pools of dark material with a mud like consistency to practice self rescue and lastly  our >>

"On The POT"  BBQ SPOT !

Everyone gets a White ELJER* Porcelain "Self Cleaning" Pot with plastic seat to sit on during the BBQ.. No need to bring your chairs.

-----------------

I have special KAYAK instructors all ready to help you into the  Water..

Below are just a few of em:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

----------

 

A Kayak Paddling Instructor is con-Trolling the Simulated  "WHITE" water conditions to our practice area. Jump on in ..the water is warm...

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Here is our Kayak SELF RESCUE PRACTICE  Pool:

YOU WILL PRACTICE SELF RESCUE IN HERE FOR SURE !

(Remember to hold your breath and Do Not Swallow the water)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ALL Future "PADDLING" Events are already written and stored ready to be chosen given the day and or weather conditions closer to the event day AT THE INTENDED PADDLING SITE..or the alternate back up location.

NO NEED TO RSVP just yet unless you are ready for anything any time and enjoy the kinds of events that may be posted soon..

Since i have this event particular listing here.. it means its really too soon to post a paddle event into the future and it allows me a wider flexibility to propose a NEW location or choose one (or more) which is properly appropriate for the season or weather conditions.

It also allows offerings around my and other's events conflicts..and other reasons also..

The final spot chosen from the list has to be  based on the PREDICTED and/or CURRENT Air Weather, Water Temps, Currents, Tides, Wind at the site/// Remember we have to avoid Fishing Tournaments and other large groups competing for the limited parking spaces .

Note: AS always, the event listing order may change, i choose what fits best and when.. you can suggest but i decide after investigating the goods and bads..

 

See ya on the next event posted.

al-r

PLEASE cut down FROM POSTING "CHATTER" COMMENTS IN THE AREA BELOW.

I AND MOST MEMBERS ARE TURNED OFF BY THE ENDLESS CHATTER THAT ARE WAY TO COMMON ON ALL THOSE *OTHER* MEETUP GROUPS.

HOWEVER; MATERIAL COMMENTS DIRECTLY RELATING TO THE EVENT THAT ARE  OF A BENEFIT TO THE GROUP ARE OK.
item.how_to_find_us: Chomping on the Bit with paddles in hand and kayaks floating...Ready for Action !

item.name: Our New Paddling Training Facility and "On The Pot" Lucky BBQ Spot.
